review: Amazon is slowly taking over my life.  The Fire TV is a great product with much better specs than my Apple TV.  I wish the home screen were better and/or customizable (c'mon Amazon, it's not that hard), but with a few Kodi hacks this thing is amazing and hosts all my home network content.  Fits well into the Amazon ecosystem--I have two of these boxes and thoroughly enjoy them.  Also, the landscape scenes on the screensaver are honestly some of the best photos I've seen. Great, great product. Pure value.
